query: What is the maximum operating temperature?

results.text: Temperature Sensor X100 - Technical Datasheet Model X100 is a high-precision industrial temperature sensor designed for environments up to 1200°C. Specifications: Operating range -200°C to 1200°C, Accuracy ±0.5°C, Response time 0.3s. Applications: Metallurgy, furnaces, and chemical processing. Material: Inconel 600 sheath, platinum core. Compliance: ISO 9001, CE certified.

Comparison Table – Industrial Sensors The following table compares our main sensor models: Model | Max Temp (°C) | Accuracy | Output | Material X100 | 1200 | ±0.5°C | Analog | Inconel 600 Y250 | 180 | ±0.3°C | Digital | Stainless Steel T310 | 800 | ±0.2°C | Analog | Titanium Alloy The X100 model is best suited for extreme heat applications.
